title: Sports Memorabilia Offer 'Immense' Upside for Wealth Management Firms
description: Advisors are missing out on an opportunity to help themselves, their firms, and their clients, argues Howard Epstein, a wealth management advisor and sports memorabilia expert.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Advisors are missing out on an opportunity to help themselves, their firms, and their clients, argues Howard Epstein, a wealth management advisor and sports memorabilia expert.
